name: Guess The Time
description:
Ahhh analog clocks... they are hard to read due to their clock hands, but they are so cool... So, why not become a master in reading analog clocks?

The gameplay is simple: you have a limited time to provide the highest number of correct answers, but keep in mind that a wrong answer gives you a time penalty, while a correct one gives you a time bonus.

This is a game in progress, so there is only one game mode and the graphic is not super cool yet.

The source code is available at https://github.com/rudyvic/guess-the-time.
